item.title: RSS Feed Test
item.description: Here I am today, testing out the new RSS Feed. I hope it works!

item.title: Ultrasone?
item.description: We love music, we love high quality, and we now have the opportunity to work with ULtrasone’s top of the line headphones. If you are not familiar with Ultrasone, here is a quick breakdown of their innovative headphones. These German engineered headphones all come with Ultrasone's patented S-Logic™ Natural Surround Sound and S-Logic™ PLUS
